body.name: Vacmaster Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner 2 in 1 Ultra-Lightweight 14Kpa Power Suction Handheld Vacuum Cleaner with Washable HEPA Filter for Home, Car, Pet Hair, Carpet, Hard Floor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 1 min
features: Versatile Cleaning：2-in-1 Stick Vacuum Cleaner can easily switch to handheld vacuum with various attachments allowing you to clean everywhere in your home. Accessories include: floor nozzle, crevice tool and 2 in 1 brush tool suitable for edges, drawers, drapes and more.

14Kpa Power Suction & Adjustable Tube：Corded Vacuum with powerful 14 Kpa suction motor provides continuous power for a whole home clean. Telescopic and extendable wand is perfect for cleaning above floor and accessing hard-to-reach areas.

Capitalize Efficiency Filtration：This Portable Vacuum Cleaner creates a high speed rotating airflow to remove particulates from air. Washable filter requires less frequent replacements and captures 85% of particles, providing ultimate purified air and excellent cleaning experience for every user.

3.7 Lbs Lightweight & Portable：Super lightweight design at 3.7lbs makes this Stick Vacuum Cleaner easy to carry, store and operate. The easy-empty dust cup can quicker and easier trips to the trash and is great for extended use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for hard floors--yay, no more sweeping!
reviews.reviewText: Moving in to a new house with beautiful smooth tile floor was a vast difference from the fully carpeted house we came from. I came to quickly learn that A. If I wanted a clean house, I was going to need to sweep EVERY SINGLE DAY (you know that feeling when you walk around barefoot on hard floors and end up with dirt covering the bottoms of your feet? yeah, it's pretty awful), and B. Our trusty carpet vacuum was not going to do the trick. *sigh* So my options were to: sweep every single day for the rest of my life, deal with the dirt getting on my feet (yeah...no), or purchase a floor vacuum. ding ding ding. Floor vacuum it was!Through the black hole of Amazon searches, I came across this one and took a chance when there were NO reviews (I know, such a thrill seeker here!) but it had all the features I wanted most: lightweight, good suction power, convertible (to be able to use for more than just vacuuming my floor), affordable, and corded (the really good cordless ones would end up costing me my first born, so yup, this was on the list). Now that I've used it for a week, I'm here to give you the deets so you don't have to take quite as much of a chance.Let's start with the cons:--It takes a hot minute to arrive. I've gotten used to prime one-day shipping, so waiting a week was like waiting an eternity--It doesn't have a place to put the cord. This is not a deal breaker for me, but sure would be nice to be able to put the cord away neatly somehow. Bonus if it had a retractable cord thing. But alas, it does not! I end up rolling it back and tying it with the Velcro strip it comes with.--I don't quite understand the purpose of some of the buttons...but that may just be personal user error (instruction manual, what that? ;) )Pros:--It's got three different attachments--the floor attachment (which is extendable!), one with a brush (perfect for vacuuming furniture), and a thin pointed one to use for all the nooks and crannies--It's lightweight. You're not going to be building any significant muscles using this one, that's for sure. You might even be able to give it to your child to use--teach 'em young and all that--The floor attachment head SWIVELS! This means you can pretty much get anywhere with it--corners and under all the furniture, it's pretty great. I was able to vacuum fully under our king-sized bed with no significant effort.--It does what it's supposed to--clean the floor. Picks up dirt, litter, and oh boy, does it get all the cat hair tumbleweeds plaguing our house thanks to our two cats (one of which has a preposterous amount of fur)What this vacuum is not going to do is get hair out of carpets--it's not meant for that. It has no roller at the bottom, so if that is something you are looking for, look elsewhere. But if you have hard floors, are looking for an affordable lightweight vacuum that isn't going to take up a lot of room, yet want something that will work for it's intended purpose, I recommend this one. If my experience changes as I continue using it, I will be sure to add it on to my review here.08/15/2020

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cheap vac
reviews.reviewText: Powerful little vac. Definitely helped with pet hair and everyday clean up. It’s small and lightweight for easy storage. The brush attachment is a godsent for vacuuming upholstery and rugs as well. My only complaint is there’s no hooks to wrap the cord up when bit in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great light weight vacuum to pick up dust, cat and dog fur, small things. I love it because it goes right under my sofa, tv stand and all of my furniture where the big vacuum can't reach. The suction, believe it or not, is pretty good for these places. The biggest problem for me is the dust filter. When you go to clean it, it is very hard to get all the dust out. It would have been nice if they had made it removable. I have to plug in and get my other small hand vacuum to clean it. It's a drag and takes more time. It would have been so simple to just have had a removable filter! I would have even paid more money to have that feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but powerful
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my mother so she could get rid of the one she has that never picked anything up even though she thought different. I didn’t want to spend too much money,wanted something light and not a hassle and with this that converts to a hand vacuum is a major plus. I put it together for her,very easy so I didn’t need the instructions. As I was putting it together I was saying to myself “this thing won’t be doing much”…I WAS WRONG!! This has some really good suction power! She is very happy and she said now she can throw the old DD she has away (which means it’ll go in her garage lol). So I’m happy with this purchase. It maneuvers really well. I got to see for myself how well it really works. & She has area rugs,marble,tile and no carpet. She has a cat that sheds and I read some reviews than mentioned this isn’t good for pet hair,it works fine on her area rug with her one cat. Maybe not good for multiple pets with carpet. The only downside to me is it doesn’t stand on it’s own and it’s not cordless,but overallI’m happy!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works great for those quick little pick ups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I Think I Received A Refurbished Vacuum…
reviews.reviewText: although I thought I was purchasing a new one😕 JUST took it out the box/plastic and there’s a crack on the part that encases the hose. I’m not sure why this item got such good reviews bc it’s very flimsy and a lot lighter than I expected. Will probably have to return because I need something good on pet hair and dust for my apartment and it’s already falling apart before I even put it together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little but powerful
reviews.reviewText: This is light and little but wow it's powerful. BUY NOW

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars House Plant Parakeet vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Bought vacuum to clean up dirt that falls from my plants and feathers from my parakeet. Great suction, nozzles are skinny enough to get under my shelves. Unit gets a pretty warm after vacuuming for about eight minutes. overall good for getting into small crannies and picks up bigger crumbs. It is a heavier than I expected, but not bad. Actually seems well-made. electric cord and unit materials are nice. I empty out dust and tap out filter more often so it doesn’t get clogged so fast.
